translations.translation: Verily the pious will be in heaven,
Verily the virtuous shall be in Bliss;
The virtuous will live in bliss,
Indeed the virtuous are in serenity.
Verily, Al-Abrar (the righteous believers) will be in Delight.
Most surely the righteous shall be in bliss,
Surely the pious shall be in bliss,
Lo! the righteous verily are in delight,
The virtuous will surely be in bliss,
Verily the virtuous shall be in Delight,
The pious shall be amid bliss,
Truly the Righteous will be in Bliss:
Verily, Al-Abrar (the pious who fear Allah and avoid evil) will be in delight (Paradise).
The righteous shall indeed be blissful,
Indeed, the righteous will be amid bliss.
Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure
[83:22] Assuredly the pious will be amid bliss, [in] Paradise,
(Lo! the righteous) those who are true in their faith, and these are the ones who do not harm even the tiniest ant (verily are in delight) in Paradise whose bliss is everlasting,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبالجملة: { إِنَّ ٱلأَبْرَارَ } البارين على الله، المبرورين بين الناس { لَفِي نَعِيمٍ } [المطففين: 22] مقيم
